price: Kae εberε a boniayεfoͻ no kͻͻ wo tiri so apam sε wͻde wo bεto afiase, anaasε wͻɛbeku wo, anaasε wͻbɛtu wo (afiri ͻman no mu); wͻbͻͻ pͻ paa, na Nyankopͻn nso bͻͻ pͻ, na Nyankopͻn pͻbͻ na εyε pͻbͻ pa kyεn apͻ bͻfoͻ nyinaa.
arabic: وَإِذۡ يَمۡكُرُ بِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِيُثۡبِتُوكَ أَوۡ يَقۡتُلُوكَ أَوۡ يُخۡرِجُوكَۚ وَيَمۡكُرُونَ وَيَمۡكُرُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idh yamkuru bika alladhīna kafarū liyuth'bitūka aw yaqtulūka aw yukh'rijūka wayamkurūna wayamkuru al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-mākirīna
